name: gfc_2020_v18_lossyear
title: Year of gross forest cover loss event (GFC 2020 v1.8)
description: Year of forest loss during the period 2000-2020, where loss is defined as a stand-replacement disturbance, or a change from a forest to non-forest state.
details: Output format is a column for every year, where rows in column are the number of pixels of forest loss associated with that year and unit of analysis. Forest loss is only associated with the first year it is detected and no subsequent years.

extract_types_info.categorical: number of pixels of forest loss which occured in each year

extras.citation: Hansen, M. C., P. V. Potapov, R. Moore, M. Hancher, S. A. Turubanova, A. Tyukavina, D. Thau, S. V. Stehman, S. J. Goetz, T. R. Loveland, A. Kommareddy, A. Egorov, L. Chini, C. O. Justice, and J. R. G. Townshend. 2013. “High-Resolution Global Maps of 21st-Century Forest Cover Change.” Science 342 (15 November): 850–53.
